contentList.content: Instead of its Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, the affected entity adds its <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Instead of its Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>, the affected entity adds its <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag> to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Shoot a thin ray from your finger. If the [1] reduces the target to 0 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit points</LSTag>, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash.
After dealing damage with an unarmed attack, the wearer gains a +[1] bonus to their spell save <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> for 1 turn.
Affected entity has a +[1] bonus to save against spell <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">DC</LSTag> per turn remaining.
